title: "Exponential data growth could turn storage for AI into an information supply chain"
excerpt: "The rise of AI has led to the need for vast amounts of data. That won’t be changing any time soon — data centers are projected to become the world’s largest energy consumers, rising from 3% of total electricity use in 2017 to 4.5% by 2025."
